trans-unit.source: OpenBVE is a free and open-source multi-platform train simulator, featuring support for 2D and 3D cabs and scenery.\r\n\r\nThis program was initially developed by Michelle, and is released into the public domain where legally possible.
trans-unit.target: OpenBVE is a free and open-source multi-platform train simulator, featuring support for 2D and 3D cabs and scenery.\r\n\r\nThis program was initially developed by Michelle, and is released into the public domain where legally possible.

trans-unit.source: OpenBVE makes use of several open-source libraries, whose licenses are reproduced below:
trans-unit.target: OpenBVE makes use of several open-source libraries, whose licenses are reproduced below:

trans-unit.source: This function will create a zip archive on your Desktop, containing the previous Simulation log and Crash log (If any), along with a text file containing the brief description of the problem entered below.\r\n\r\nPlease post this on the discussion board, or create a new issue on Github.
trans-unit.target: This function will create a zip archive on your Desktop, containing the previous Simulation log and Crash log (If any), along with a text file containing the brief description of the problem entered below.\r\n\r\nPlease post this on the discussion board, or create a new issue on Github.

trans-unit.source: Please enter a brief description of the problem:
trans-unit.target: Please enter a brief description of the problem:

trans-unit.source: The report has been saved as "[filename]" on your desktop. \r\n\r\nYou may now submit a bug report to the discussion board, or open an issue on GitHub with this zip file attached.
trans-unit.target: The report has been saved as "[filename]" on your desktop. \r\n\r\nYou may now submit a bug report to the discussion board, or open an issue on GitHub with this zip file attached.

trans-unit.source: Cannot create bug report! \r\n\r\nYou may access the Log and Crash Log directly by clicking the "View..." button, then submit these logs to the discussion board or open an issue on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: Cannot create bug report! \r\n\r\nYou may access the Log and Crash Log directly by clicking the "View..." button, then submit these logs to the discussion board or open an issue on GitHub.

trans-unit.source: A connection to the server could be established. Unfortunately, the version information could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Får tilkoblet serveren, men dessverre kan vi ikke hente ned versjonen.

trans-unit.source: You already have the latest version.
The new version [version] ([date]) is available for download on the Official Homepage.
trans-unit.target: Versjon [version] ([date]) er tilgjengelig for nedlasting på den offisielle nettsiden.

trans-unit.source: The most recent nightly build from [date] is available for download.
trans-unit.target: The most recent nightly build from [date] is available for download.

trans-unit.source:
A critical error occured: 

 [error] 

 Please inspect the error log file for further information.
A critical error occured whilst parsing the [file] file
trans-unit.target: En kritisk feil oppstod ved lasting av filen [file]

trans-unit.source: The file system configuration could not be accessed or is invalid due to the following reason:
trans-unit.target: Filsystemkonfigurasjonen kunne ikke bli nådd på grunn av følgende grunn:

trans-unit.source: An older key-configuration file was found.
The current key-configuration has been reset to defaults.
trans-unit.target: Den nåværende knapp-konfigurasjonen har blitt satt tilbake til standard.

trans-unit.source: The default key assingment file is an older version or corrupt.
trans-unit.target: Filen med standard-knappeoppsettet oppsettet er en gammel versjon eller korrupt.

trans-unit.source: The default key assignment file does not exist.
You are currently running on the [platform] backend. Please use the in-game menu to configure any joystick based controls.
trans-unit.target: Du kjører nå [platform] backend. Bruk spill-menyen for å konfigurere joystick baserte kontroller.

trans-unit.source: OpenAL 1.1 is required. You seem to have version 1.0.
trans-unit.target: OpenAL 1.1 er påkrevd. Du ser ut til å ha versjon 1.0.

trans-unit.source: The OpenAL context could not be created.
The OpenAL sound device could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: OpenAL driveren kunne ikke bli åpnet.

trans-unit.source: An error occured whilst attempting to switch to fullscreen mode.
trans-unit.target: En feil oppstod mens programmet prøvde å bytte til fullskjermsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Please check your fullscreen resolution settings.
The selected route is corrupt: \r\n WithTrack section missing.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte ruten er korrupt: \r\n WithTrack seksjonen mangler.

trans-unit.source: The selected route is corrupt: \r\n No stations defined.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte ruten er korrupt: \r\n Ingen stasjoner er definert.

trans-unit.source: The selected route is corrupt: \r\n No objects defined.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte ruten er korrupt: \r\n Ingen objekter er definert.

trans-unit.source: The selected route is corrupt: \r\n Unable to locate all defined objects.
The train plugin [plugin] failed to load.
The built-in ATS/ ATC systems will be used instead, which may cause issues.
Attempted to create a package with an empty filename.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å opprette en pakke med tomt filnavn.

trans-unit.source: The directory in which you attempted to save the package file does not exist: \r \n
trans-unit.target: Mappen du prøvde å lagre filen til pakken eksisterer ikke: \r \n

trans-unit.source: No write access available in the directory in which you attempted to save the package file: \r \n
trans-unit.target: Mappen du prøvde å lagre filen til pakken til kan ikke skrives til: \r \n

trans-unit.source: Failed to create the following file: \r \n
trans-unit.target: Det gikk ikke å lage følgende fil: \r \n

trans-unit.source: Please check that this path is accessible.
trans-unit.target: Vennligst sjekk om denne fil-stien er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: If you are attempting to install addons in the Program Files or ProgramData folders, this may require administrator permission. \r\n\r\n This is not recommended for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å installere addons i Programfiler eller Programdata mappene, kan det hende at det krever administrator rettigheter. \r\n\r\n Dette er ikke anbefalt av sikkerhetsmessige grunner.

trans-unit.source: The package database version appears to be a newer version than supported by this copy of OpenBVE.
The package database XML was invalid, and has been re-created.
The package worker thread is currently busy. Please wait a moment and try again.
Please first select a route file to begin.
The .Turn command and the .Switch command may not be used in the same route.
Use the train suggested by the route
trans-unit.target: Bruk toget som er standard for rute

trans-unit.source: The default train could not be found:\r\n\r\n
trans-unit.target: Det forhåndsvalgte toget kunne ikke bli funnet:\r\n\r\n

trans-unit.source: --- This train uses a safety system plugin which cannot be used on your operating system. The built-in safety systems ATS/ATC will be used instead, which might cause operational problems. ---
trans-unit.target: --- Dette toget bruker en plugin for sikkerhets-systemer som ikke kan bli benyttet på ditt operativsystem. Det innebygde sikkerhetssystemet ATS/ATC vil bli brukt i stede for. Dette kan forårsake problemer. ---

trans-unit.source:
The default train is not currently installed:

 [train]

 It may be downloaded at:
These are shown in the list below:
trans-unit.target: Disse er vist i listen under:

trans-unit.source: Select the type of packages you wish to view:
trans-unit.target: Velg type pakker du ønsker å se:

trans-unit.source: This file does not appear to be a valid OpenBVE package.
trans-unit.target: Filen ser ikke ut til å være en valid OpenBVE pakke.

trans-unit.source: The selected package is already installed, and is a newer version.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte pakken er allerede installert og er en nyere versjon.

trans-unit.source: The selected package is already installed, and is an older version.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte pakken er allerede installert og er en eldre versjon.

trans-unit.source: The selected package is already installed, and is an identical version.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte pakken er allerede installert og er en lik versjon.

trans-unit.source: A list of files installed is shown below:
trans-unit.target: En liste over filer installert vises under:

trans-unit.source: The current package has unmet dependancies.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte pakken har avhengigheter som ikke er oppfylt.

trans-unit.source: The following dependancies may be broken by this action:
trans-unit.target: Følgende avhengigheter blir ødelagt av denne handlingen:

trans-unit.source: The following packages are recommended, but not installed:
trans-unit.target: Følgende pakker er anbefalt men ikke installert:

trans-unit.source: If your package does not rely on other dependencies, you may continue by clicking the "Create" button.
trans-unit.target: If your package does not rely on other dependencies, you may continue by clicking the "Create" button.

trans-unit.source: Package details and dependancies may be assigned in the following steps.
trans-unit.target: Pakke detaljer og avhengigheter vil bli lagt til i følgende steg.

trans-unit.source: The following files and folders will be packaged:
trans-unit.target: Følgende filer og pakker vil bli pakket:

trans-unit.source: The new package has been assigned the following GUID:
trans-unit.target: Den nye pakken har fått følgende GUID:

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid package version number in the following format: \r\n 1.0.0
trans-unit.target: Legg til en gyldig pakkeversjonsnummer på følgende format: \r\n 1.0.0

trans-unit.source: You have entered an invalid version number. \r\n Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Du har skrevet inn et ikke gyldig versjonsnummer. \r\n Prøv igjen.

trans-unit.source: The following files were added to your package:
trans-unit.target: Følgende filer ble lagt til din pakke:

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, creation of your package failed.
trans-unit.target: Dessverre feilet opprettelsen av pakken din.

trans-unit.source: No files were selected to package- Please retry.
trans-unit.target: Ingen filer ble lagt til i pakken. Prøv igjen.

trans-unit.source: The selected filename is invalid- Please retry.
trans-unit.target: Valgt filnavn er ikke gyldig. Prøv igjen.

trans-unit.source: The new package has been assigned the following GUID:
trans-unit.target: Pakken har blitt tildelt følgende GUID:

trans-unit.target: Bytter ut pakken med følgende GUID:

trans-unit.target: Er dette en oppdatering av en eksisterende pakke?

trans-unit.source: Please select the package you wish to replace:
trans-unit.target: Velg pakken du ønsker å bytte ut:

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, uninstallation of this package failed.
Uninstallation of this package was successful.
trans-unit.target: Avinstalleringen av denne pakken var vellykket.

trans-unit.source: Some existing packages may be broken by this action.
trans-unit.target: Eksisterende pakker kan bli skadet av denne handlingen.

trans-unit.target: Ikke mulig å avinstallere den valgte pakken. \r\n XML listefil mangler.

trans-unit.target: Ønsker du å fjerne denne pakken helt fra databasen?

trans-unit.target: En feil oppstod mens pakken prøvde å lagres til databasen. \r\n Vennligst sjekk om du har skriverettigheter.

trans-unit.target: Velg handlingen du ønsker å ta:

trans-unit.target: Prøvde å lage en pakke med tomt filnavn.

trans-unit.target: Mappen hvor du prøvede å skrive pakken til fins ikke: \r \n

trans-unit.source: The package database version appears to be a newer version than supported by this copy of OpenBVE.
The package database XML was invalid, and has been re-created.
The package worker thread is currently busy. Please wait a moment and try again.
Reset the current control configuration to the defaults?
Click here to enable keyboard grab to automatically select the desired key.
trans-unit.target: Trykk her for å velge ønsket knapp på tastaturet.

trans-unit.source: Click here to enable joystick grab to automatically select the desired axis, button or hat.
trans-unit.target: Trykk her for å velge ønsket knapp på joysticken.

trans-unit.source: Press a button or move an axis or hat into the desired direction...
trans-unit.target: Trykk en knapp eller beveg en akse inn i ønsket retning...

trans-unit.source: Move an axis into the direction of "increase" or "power"...
trans-unit.target: Flytt en akse inn i ønsket retning "øke akselerasjon"...
Feil ved lasting av RailDriver kalibreringsfil.

trans-unit.source: Move the reverser lever to the full reverse position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Dytt vendegir-spaken til fullstendig revers og trykk 'Neste'.

trans-unit.source: Move the reverser lever to the full forward position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Dytt vendegir-spaken til fullstendig forover og trykk 'Neste'.

trans-unit.source: Move the combined brake / throttle lever to the full power position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Dytt kombinasjonsbremsen til full akselerasjon og trykk 'Neste'.

trans-unit.source: Move the combined brake / throttle lever to the full brake position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Dytt kombinasjonsbremsen til full brems og trykk 'Neste'.

trans-unit.source: Move the dynamic brake lever to the release position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Dytt den regenerative bremsen til fullstendig av og trykk 'Neste'

trans-unit.source: Move the dynamic brake lever to the emergency position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Dytt den regenerative bremsen til nødbrems og trykk 'Neste'

trans-unit.source: Move the independant brake lever to the release position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Dytt lokomotiv bremsen til fullstendig av og trykk 'Neste'

trans-unit.source: Move the independant brake lever to the full position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Dytt lokomotiv bremsen til fullstendig på og trykk 'Neste'

trans-unit.source: Move the bail-off lever to the release position and press 'Next'.
Move and hold the bail-off lever into the full position and press 'Next'.
Move the wiper switch to OFF and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Flytt vindusvisker til AV og trykk 'Neste'

trans-unit.source: Move the wiper switch to FULL and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Flytt vindusvisker til FULL og trykk 'Neste'

trans-unit.source: Move the lights switch to OFF and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Flytt lysbryteren til AV og trykk 'Neste'

trans-unit.source: Move the lights switch to FULL and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Flytt lysbryteren til FULL og trykk 'Neste'
Antall lyder som kan spilles på en gang:
Mappe for installasjon av andre ting:

trans-unit.source: Attempt to fix transparency issues in older content.
trans-unit.target: Prøver å fiske feil med gjennomsiktighet for gammelt innhold.

trans-unit.source: Enable hacks for buggy older content.
trans-unit.target: Slå på "hacks" for buggy gammelt innhold.

trans-unit.source: WARNING: If you enable Input Device Plugin(s), these may conflict with one or more controls.
trans-unit.target: ADVARSEL: Hvis du slår på Inndataenhetplugin kan de skape konflikt med andre kontrollenheter.

trans-unit.source:
Some issues were encountered while loading the route and train.

As some files could not be found, the route or train might not appear as intended. Try to redownload the route and train packages in order to ensure that you have a complete distribution.

The following list of issues might give additional information. You can still start the route by selecting "Ignore" from below.

Some issues were encountered while loading the route and train. If you are the route or train developer, it might be worth taking a look at the following list of issues.\r\n\r\nAs a regular user, you can select "Ignore" at this point to start the game.
You may proceed at [speed] [unit] with extreme caution.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kjøre i [speed] [unit] med ekstrem forsiktighet.

trans-unit.source: You have passed a stop signal. Please apply the emergency brakes immediately and come to a complete hold.
trans-unit.target: Du har kjørt forbi et stop-signal. Vennligst slå på nødbrems umiddelbart og stopp toget.

trans-unit.source: The signal indicates a speed limit of [limit] [unit]. You are currently traveling at [speed] [unit]. Please slow down.
trans-unit.target: Signalet indikerer fartsgrense på [limit] [unit]. Du kjører nå i [speed] [unit]. Vennligst senk farten.

trans-unit.source: The speed post indicates a speed limit of [limit] [unit]. You are currently traveling at [speed] [unit]. Please slow down.
trans-unit.target: Fartsgrensen er på [limit] [unit]. Du kjører nå i [speed] [unit]. Vennligst senk farten.

trans-unit.source: You have arrived at [name] and are [time] late.
trans-unit.target: Du har ankommet [name] og er [time] for sen.

trans-unit.source: You have arrived at [name] and are [time] early.
trans-unit.target: Du har ankommet [name] og er [time] for tidlig.
Du har stoppet [difference] m for sent.
Du har stoppet [difference] m for tidlig.

trans-unit.source: Boarding complete. You may close the doors now.
trans-unit.target: Ombordstigning er ferdig. Du kan lukke dørene nå.

trans-unit.source: You have passed [name] where you should have stopped.
trans-unit.target: Du har kjørt forbi [name] hvor du skulle ha stoppet.

trans-unit.source: You have passed [name] while still boarding. Please come to a complete hold immediately.
trans-unit.target: Du har passert [name] mens du fremdeles laster på. Stopp umiddelbart.

trans-unit.source: This feature is not available in Expert mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonen er ikke tilgjengelig i ekspert modus.

trans-unit.source: The AI might be unable to fully operate this train.
trans-unit.target: Den kunstige intelligensen klarer kanskje ikke å kjøre dette toget.

trans-unit.source: Please switch to exterior view to uncouple.
Uncoupling the rear of car number
Uncoupling the front of car number
This coupler is fixed, and cannot uncouple.
Do you really want to exit to the main menu?
trans-unit.target: Er du sikker på at du vil avslutte til menyen?

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to quit?
trans-unit.target: Er du sikker på at du vil avslutte?

trans-unit.source: Please press any key or move a joystick axis to set this control...
Do you wish to use the default train?
Increases power by one notch for trains with two handles
trans-unit.target: Øker turtallet med et hakk for tog med to håndtak

trans-unit.source: Decreases power by one notch for trains with two handles
trans-unit.target: Minster turtallet med et hakk for tog med to håndtak

trans-unit.source: Controls power for trains with two handles on half of a joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer turtallet for tog med to håndtak på en halv joystick akse

trans-unit.source: Controls power for trains with two handles on a full joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer turtallet på tog med to håndtak på en full joystick akse

trans-unit.source: Decreases brake by one notch for trains with two handles
trans-unit.target: Slepp opp bremsen med et hakk for tog med to håndtak

trans-unit.source: Increases brake by one notch for trains with two handles
trans-unit.target: Øk bremsen med et hakk for tog med to håndtak

trans-unit.source: Decreases the locomotive brake by one notch
Increases the locomotive brake by one notch
Controls brake for trains with two handles on half of a joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer bremsen for tog med to håndtak på en halv joystick akse

trans-unit.source: Controls brake for trains with two handles on a full joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer bremsen for tog med to håndtak på en hel joystick akse

trans-unit.source: Activates emergency brakes for trains with two handles
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer nødbrems for tog med to håndtak

trans-unit.source: Moves handle toward power by one notch for trains with one handle
trans-unit.target: Dytter håndtaket et trinn mot høyere turtall for tog med et håndtak

trans-unit.source: Moves handle toward neutral by one notch for trains with one handle
trans-unit.target: Dytter håndtaket ett trinn mot nøytral stilling for tog med et håndtak

trans-unit.source: Moves handle toward brake by one notch for trains with one handle
trans-unit.target: Dytter håndtaket ett trinn mot brems for tog med et håndtak

trans-unit.source: Activates emergency brake for trains with one handle
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer nødbrems for tog med et håndtak

trans-unit.source: Controls power and brake for trains with one handle on a full joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer turtall og brems for tog med ett håndtak på en full joystick akse

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the power notch directly from a command option value.
trans-unit.target: Juster turtallet til en direkte posisjon via en gitt verdi

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the brake notch directly from a command option value.
trans-unit.target: Juster bremsen til en direkte posisjon via en gitt verdi

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the reverser directly from a command option value.
trans-unit.target: Juster vendegiret til en direkte posisjon via en gitt verdi

trans-unit.source: Moves reverser forward by one notch
Moves reverser backward by one notch
Controls reverser on a full joystick axis
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer vendegiret på en full joystick akse

trans-unit.source: Opens or closes the left doors
Opens or closes the right doors
Plays or stops the music horn

Switches to the train's interior view. However, the panel is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Bytt til togets interiørvisning. Panelt vises ikke.

trans-unit.source: Switches to the train's exterior view
Jumps to the previous point of interest in the route.
trans-unit.target: Hopper til forrige punkt av interesse på denne ruten.

trans-unit.source: Jumps to the next point of interest in the route.
trans-unit.target: Hopper til neste punkt av interesse på denne ruten.

trans-unit.source: Resets the camera view to default values
Activates or deactivates interior view camera restriction
Moves the cursor up within the in-game menu
Moves the cursor down within the in-game menu
Performs the selected command within the in-game menu
trans-unit.target: Velger den valgte kommandoen i spillmenyen

trans-unit.source: Goes back within the in-game menu
Toggles through different speed display modes
Toggles through different gradient display modes
Toggles through different next station remain distance display modes

trans-unit.source: Toggles through different time acceleration factors

trans-unit.target: Viser eller skjuler bilde per sekund visningen

Toggles to or from fullscreen mode
Mutes sound or resumes playing sounds
Switches to or from reduced CPU mode
trans-unit.target: Bytter til og fra redusert CPU modus

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides brake system debug output
trans-unit.target: Vis eller skjul utskrift fra bremsesystem

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides plugin debug output
trans-unit.target: Vis eller skjul utskrift fra plugins

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the touch range
trans-unit.target: Vis eller skjul avstand man kan nå / ta til

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the route information window
trans-unit.target: Vis eller skjul informasjon om ruten

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides event markers (For developers)
Increases the speed of the windscreen wipers
Decreases the speed of the windscreen wipers
Activates or deactivates the live steam injector
Activates or deactivates the exhaust steam injector
Activates or deactivates the cylinder cocks
Shifts up a gear in a train fitted with a gearbox
trans-unit.target: Skifter opp et gir i et tog utstyrt med girkasse

trans-unit.source: Shifts down a gear in a train fitted with a gearbox
trans-unit.target: Skifter ned et gir i et tog utstyrt med girkasse

trans-unit.source: Toggles the RailDriver speed display units.
Accessibility: Audibly announces the current speed.
Accessibility: Audibly announces the next signal distance and aspect.
Accessibility: Audibly announces the the next station name and distance.
Uncouples the front coupler for the selected car.
Uncouples the rear coupler for the selected car.
Hold the [button] button in the controller and press OK.
Move the brake handle to [notch] and press OK.
Move the power handle to [notch] and press OK.
My controller is not detected or does not work properly
My controller is not working correctly
My PS2 controller is not detected

If your non-USB controller is not providing correct input:

1. Ensure the USB adapter is working. Ideally, the adapter should map the direction buttons from a standard controller to separate buttons to avoid compatibility issues.
2. Calibrate the controller from the configuration window, if necessary.
If your PS2 controller does not appear in the list, follow these steps:

1. Extract the Windows drivers.
2. Download and run Zadig.
3. Load the appropriate CFG file for your device ("Device > Load Preset Device").
4. Press "Install Driver" and wait for installation to complete.

LibUsb appears to be either missing, or has not been correctly symlinked for runtime loading.
Please follow the following instructions:

1. Check that the "libusb-1.0" package is installed.
2. Find the location of "libusb-1.0.so.0" - On recent Ubuntu and Debian versions, this is likely to be "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/"
3. Open the directory in the terminal.
4. Check this location to see if "libusb-1.0.so" exists.
5. If the file does not exist, we must create the appropriate symlink by executing the following command from this terminal: "sudo ln -s libusb-1.0.so.0 libusb-1.0.so"
1. Extract the Linux udev file.\r\n2. Copy the file to "/etc/udev/rules.d/" (root permissions required).\r\n3. Reboot or reload udev rules manually.

BrakeNotches must be at least 1 if HoldBrake is set.

trans-unit.source: DriverPowerNotches must be less than or equal to PowerNotches.
trans-unit.target: Førerbremsen må være mindre eller lik turtallshakkene.

trans-unit.source: DriverBrakeNotches must be less than or equal to BrakeNotches.
trans-unit.target: Førers bremsehakk må være mindre eller lik bremsehakkene

trans-unit.source: DriverCar must be less than NumberOfMotorCars + NumberOfTrailerCars.
NumberOfTrailerCars must be at least 1 if FrontCarIsAMotorCar is not set.
trans-unit.target: Antall trekkvogner må være minst 1 hvis første vogn ikke er satt til motorvogn.
